QuestData.Title: Greymane's Gambit
QuestData.Description:
The Skyfire is prepared to make way to Stormheim. Should we become engaged, I will require my best fighters on the front line.
This includes you, $c.
QuestData.LogDescription: Complete Greymane's mission aboard the Skyfire.
QuestData.RewardText: It seems you were spared the brunt of the explosion. If only Greymane were so lucky...$B$BOn your feet! We had better get a move on before the Forsaken are on top of us!
